articles.description: A member of the search marketing community tweeted startling allegations of a Google Ads salesperson. Danny Sullivan responded with help.
articles.content:
A member of the search community alleged in a tweet that her client was explicitly told by Google that spending more on pay per click (PPC) advertising would improve their organic search rankings.

articles.title: Lenovo LAVIE MINI, PC-gaming console hybrid announced for CES 2021 - BGR India
articles.description: LAVIE MINI is a portable PC-gaming console hybrid dream that we have been seeing multiple brands show off their variation of each year at CES.
articles.content: Lenovo and NEC ahead of CES 2021 have announced a new pocket-sized convertible PC, LAVIE MINI. The device is a concept laptop and portable gaming console hybrid. The new pocket PC will be showcased a… [+3195 chars]

articles.title: 'Most-downloaded apps' on Android and iPhones in 2020 - Gadgets Now
articles.description: The app ranks among the top-10 most-downloaded apps on both Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
articles.content: Messaging app Telegram ranks at No. 9 on Google Play Store. It, however, isnt not among the top 10 on Apple App Store listing.
